segments.text: Hectic . It's always hectic . But how was your windsurfing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tried it for a half-hour.It was interesting , but ... well ... I couldn't really do it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: See ? I told you . It's very hard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I couldn't even stand on it and hold the sail . I probably fell down fifty times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And how much did it cost to rent it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was fifty dollars for a half-hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , that's not too bad then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you mean ? It's expensive !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but you have to calculate a little.You paid fifty dollars and you fell down fifty times.So you only spent one dollar per fall . That's cheap .
segments.speaker: S1
